frontmatter.title: What We Have Learned While Using AWS Lambda in Our Production Cycles for More than One Year
frontmatter.description: This guide is not about AWS, FaaS (Function as a Service) or Serverless framework, since there is a lot of such content on the Internet. Here you will only find the things that our team faced during the development and after-launch stages. This info might be helpful if you come up with doubts about which technology to adopt for your next project.

frontmatter.title: Crime and Punishment: Hype Driven Development
frontmatter.description: About the painful stuff. Here I want to share a few thoughts on how to convince "hype" technology or make proof that this technology fits good in your project. Also does not claim to be complete, it is more about how I try to deal with it.

frontmatter.title: Admin Panel Integration Tools: Which Solution to Opt for?
frontmatter.description: Comparison of Nodejs driven Admin Panels. Sometimes choice of admin panel critical for projects deadlines and budgets and general time-to-market. Also you can faced with huge amount with different solutions, both open-source, and paid SaaS-like. And in the same time - lack of information, what of them are better for your particular case. Here you can see results of research, where I took part few months ago.
